                pause 6400/
                viewport move 0 2 5000/
                pause 5200/
                speak Abigail "I feel a strange connection to it, though I can't quite explain why.$0"/
                pause 300/
                faceDirection Abigail 1/
                pause 200/
                speak Abigail "Ever since I was a child, I've been enchanted by everything supernatural and mysterious.$0#$b#This tower embodies that intrigue, the desire to understand what's beyond the ordinary.$0"/
                pause 400/
                faceDirection Abigail 0/
                pause 700/
                move Abigail 2 0 1/
                pause 200/
                speak Abigail "I used to devour books about magic, mythical creatures, and ancient artifacts.$0#$b#They took me to worlds beyond our own.$0"/
                emote farmer 32/
                pause 200/
                speak Abigail "Books were my portal to these mystical realms.$0#$b#The possibilities seemed endless, and I wanted to be part of that magic.$0"/
                pause 300/
                move Abigail -2 0 0/
                pause 900/
                speak Abigail "The supernatural has always felt like a part of me, as if I've known it in another life.$9#$b#This tower...$2#$b#It's like...$9#$b#It's like a beacon calling me home.$9"/
                emote farmer 8 true/
                move farmer -2 0 3/
                pause 500/
                faceDirection Abigail 1/
                pause 200/
                speak Abigail "I've always believed in embracing what we're passionate about.$l#$b#The unknown, the magical...$l#$b#It's all part of what makes life an adventure.$l"/

                speak Abigail "One day...$0#$b#One day, I hope to uncover the secrets hidden within these ancient walls, to feel the magic up close and understand its mysteries.$0"/

Your passion is inspiring.'(break)friendship Abigail -40\move Abigail 0 1 1\faceDirection farmer 3\speak Abigail "What is that supposed to mean?$3"\emote farmer 60\speak Abigail "Anyways.$3"(break)friendship Abigail 40\move Abigail 0 1 1\faceDirection farmer 3\speak Abigail "Thanks, @.$0#$b#Maybe one day we'll explore these mysteries together.$l#$b#Until then, I'll keep dreaming and reaching for the unknown." /
